title: of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 172 of 2025)) and the Enterprise, Tourism and
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Friendly Societies (Forms)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Friendly Societies (Forms) 

Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited friendly society (forms) regulation 2025

title: of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 172 of 2025)) and the Enterprise, Tourism and
heading: In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2018” means the Friendly Societies
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2018” means the Friendly Societies 

(Forms) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 362 of 2018).
text_norm: 2 regulation regulation 2018 mean friendly society (forms) regulation 2018 (s.i no 362 2018)

title: of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 172 of 2025)) and the Enterprise, Tourism and
heading: 3. Regulation 42 of the Regulations of 2018 is amended by the deletion of
text_raw:
3. Regulation 42 of the Regulations of 2018 is amended by the deletion of 
“, and by the further sum requisite for publication of such cancelling in the Iris 
Oifigiúil”.

“and by the further sum requisite for the like publication in the Iris Oifigiúil”.

text_raw:
9. The form (Form J) set out in Part 5 of the Schedule is substituted for the 

form (Form J) annexed to the Regulations of 2018. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Regulation 5

title: of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 172 of 2025)) and the Enterprise, Tourism and
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to prescribe amended forms for the 
purposes of the Friendly Societies Act 1896. 

 
 
 
 
 [330] 19
